# Power: Particle

Full Name: rpgitems:particle

Providing Plugin: RPGItems

Trigger: LEFT_CLICK, RIGHT_CLICK.

<!-- beginCustomHeader -->
<!-- endCustomHeader -->

## Description

Spawn some particles around the user
<!-- beginCustomDescription -->
<!-- endCustomDescription -->

## Properties

* cost

  * Type: int
  * Default: 0

  Durability cost of the power.

* dustSize

  * Type: double
  * Default: 0.0

  Size of dust particle

* particleCount

  * Type: int
  * Default: 1

  Count of particle

* offsetX

  * Type: double
  * Default: 0.0

  No description yet

* offsetZ

  * Type: double
  * Default: 0.0

  No description yet

* offsetY

  * Type: double
  * Default: 0.0

  No description yet

* material

  * Type: Material

  Material of dust particle

* dustColor

  * Type: int
  * Default: 0

  Color of dust particle

* effect

  * Type: Effect
  * Default: MOBSPAWNER_FLAMES

  Name of visual effect

* extra

  * Type: double
  * Default: 1.0

  No description yet

* particle

  * Type: Particle

  Name of particle effect

* force

  * Type: boolean
  * Default: false

  No description yet
